description: Theta series of quadratic form with Gram matrix [ 2, 1, 0; 1, 4, 1; 0, 1, 2 ].
comments: This is the tetragonal I lattice (the even holotype) of dimension 3.Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) (see A121373), phi(q) (A000122), psi(q) (A010054), chi(q) (A000700).
links: John Cannon, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
G. Nebe and N. J. A. Sloane, Home page for this lattice
M. Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
formula: a(n) = coefficient of q^2n in theta3(q)^2*theta3(q^3). Theta series of even sublattice of Z^2+sqrt(3)Z - Kok Seng Chua (chuaks(AT)ihpc.nus.edu.sg), May 07 2002Expansion of (phi(q)^2 * phi(q^3) + phi(-q)^2 * phi(-q^3)) / 2 in powers of q^2 where phi() is a Ramanujan theta function. - _Michael Somos_, Apr 05 2012a(n) = A034933(2*n). - _Michael Somos_, Apr 05 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
